Category: Support receiving and storing order data
User Requirement: User can View list of all orders with status and totals
User can Create new order by adding items and applying discounts (percentage or fixed amount)
User can See order totals calculated automatically (subtotal, discount, final total)
User can View detailed order information including all items and pricing breakdown
User can Receive validation errors when entering invalid data (negative prices, empty orders)
User can Change order status through defined workflow throughout lifecycle
User can Be prevented from making invalid status transitions (with clear error messages)
User can Cancel order from any status (except COMPLETED)
User can View complete status change history for any order with timestamps and notes
User can Filter order list by status (show only PENDING, CONFIRMED, etc.)
User can See dashboard showing count of orders in each status
User can View daily sales summary showing total orders, total revenue, and average order value
User can View hourly sales breakdown to identify peak business hours
User can Select custom date range for sales reports
